org.sakaiproject.site.impl

Class BaseSiteService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.site.impl.BaseSiteService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.entity.api.EntityProducer, org.sakaiproject.site.api.SiteService, org.sakaiproject.util.StorageUser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbSiteService

    public abstract class BaseSiteService
extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.site.api.SiteService, org.sakaiproject.util.StorageUser

    BaseSiteService is a base implementation of the SiteService.

      • allowAccessSite

        protected void allowAccessSite(org.sakaiproject.site.api.Site site)
                        throws org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException
        Checks to see if the current user has access to the site and throws an exception if they don't. This was extracted to keep the code common to getSiteVisit and allowSiteAccess
        Throws:
        org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException - If the user isn't allowed to access the site.
